name: Cactus VS Boulder
description:
Game written in 5 days for Weekly Game Jam - Week 243. The theme is "boulder".

Some things I managed to polish, some things are a bit rough, but overall the main boss fight concept is playable. Some time went into platforming controls I didn't end up using, but might be useful in the future.

Controls

Keyboard:

  • Left arrow: move left
  • Right arrow: move right
  • Down arrow: duck
  • X key: fire
  • Z key: jump
  • Enter: start/restart game

Controller:

  • D-pad left: move left
  • D-pad right: move right
  • D-pad down: duck
  • X button (Xbox): fire
  • A button (Xbox): jump
  • Start button (Xbox): start/restart game
Credits

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts good old Kenney

Everything else made by me with the aid of:

  • https://www.bfxr.net/
